data.body: i should able to to select multiple beats and click 'Scene!' from the bulk edit action component.  This should trigger the Agent like 'Take!' but with a single prompt/console - like telling the agent to plan and execute beads abc, def, ghi with parllelism.

data.title: "bulk edit" should support 'Scene!'
